mapper.select: select * from utrip_user where id like #{id}
select * from utrip_user where id like #{id}

select area_name, trip_no, title, substr(content,1,30), video_url, rating from (select area_name, t.* from area a, trip t where substr(t.trip_no,1,2) like a.area order by rating desc) t where rownum<=5
select c.course_no, c.place_no, p.place_name, p.place_x, p.place_y from course c, place p where c.place_no = p.place_no and trip_no like #{tripNo} order by course_no

select area_name, trip_no, title, substr(content,0,20), video_url, rating from trip, area where substr(trip_no,1,2) like area and trip_no like (select trip_no from (select * from trip_like order by #{mbti}) where rownum = 1)

select a.area_name, a.trip_no, a.title, a.content from (select a.area_name, substr(t.trip_no,0,2) as area, t.trip_no, t.title, substr(t.content,0,20) as content, t.rating from trip t, area a where a.area = substr(t.trip_no,0,2)) a, (select substr(trip_no,0,2) as area, max(rating) as rating from trip group by substr(trip_no,0,2)) b where a.area = b.area and a.rating = b.rating
select * from hotel where substr(hotel_no,0,2) like (select area from area where area_name=#{area_name})
